name: Xinyan
source: Reward for inviting Xinyan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Sweeping Fervor
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], randomly $[K56] 1 card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand, and creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113121]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, randomly <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand, and creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield of Passion</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Pyro DMG, randomly Discard 1 card with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand, and creates 1 Shield of Passion.

skills.name: Riff Revolution
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K5]</color> to all opposing characters on standby; $[K56] all cards in your Hand, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113123]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>, deals 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color></color> to all opposing characters on standby; <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> all cards in your Hand, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Festive Fires</color>.
skills.description: Deals 3 Physical DMG, deals 2 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby; Discard all cards in your Hand, creates 1 Festive Fires.
